data.title: Lunch at Long John's
data.text: Food was wonderful! The workers are helpful.Love the fish and chicken! The batter has a tasty flavor! Great location and very clean.

data.title: Time to Check Out Long John Silver's Cod Fish
data.text: We decided to do the drive thru and the sun made it difficult to see the menu. I order the 2 fish meal that came with hushpuppies. I asked what the side were- there were 3 sides! coleslaw, hushpuppies and fries. So since it came with the hushpuppies and I could have 2 sides guess what I picked-coleslaw and fries which I didn't want. I wanted a vegetable like the green beans they show on the website.  This will be my last trip here for a while.  The fish is heavily battered and greasy, the fries are good and the hush puppies are great, but I can really taste the salt in them.  Service was fine, but he didn't give any apology so I have to assume this is their menu because the website says it varies by store.

data.title: It's fish...
data.text:
What can be said about a restaurant chain that has been around for ages? They're successful for a reason.

We were there with a friend who raved about the cod fillets being "wonderful" - and he had a coupon. So, off we went to try LJS again after not even seeing one in 30 years. 

Not much different from the last visit. I had the cod and shrimp platter. It came with a side of fries and coleslaw. A nice touch were the little packets of everything that you could try to flavor up the meal...And it needed it. Shrimp, okay. Cod, okay. Fries, kinda okay. Hush puppies, not quite as I remember them, but okay. Coleslaw, I didn't try - I don't eat fast food mayo anything. 

It's fast food. 'Nuff said.

data.title: Courteous and friendly staff, good food.
data.text: Personnel and kind and helpful.  Food is exactly what Long John Silver's is know for.  The establishment is clean and easy to get in and out of.

data.title: Not for the dieter
data.text: Good food but greasy so if your watching weight this is a once in awhile treat. Everything is deep fried.

data.title: Cod!...
data.text: The Cod is always amazing, the batter fried cod is simply deliscious, the hash puppies are always crispy and the seasoning just right...
